articles.description: All the latest Europa League reaction as Manchester United produce a stunning extra-time comeback to reach the semi-finals as Tottenham win in Frankfurt but Rangers lose.
articles.title: Europa League reaction LIVE: Man Utd produce stunning comeback as Spurs win and Rangers lose

articles.description: Manchester United defender Harry Maguire says his side's win against Lyon was the "strangest game" of his career.
articles.title: Manchester United win against Lyon 'maddest game I've played in' - Harry Maguire

articles.description: Arne Slot believes keeping his team together would mark a "big summer" for Liverpool and said Trent Alexander-Arnold's future is still "not done".
articles.title: Arne Slot: Liverpool boss on Trent Alexander-Arnold and keeping team together in summer

articles.description: Follow live text commentary and score updates from Friday's fixtures across the EFL Championship.
articles.title: EFL Championship LIVE: Derby v Luton plus more text and score

articles.description: Under-pressure Spurs boss Ange Postecoglou says reporters are "going to have to put up with me for a little bit longer" after his side reached the Europa League semi-finals.
articles.title: Eintract Frankfurt 0-1 Tottenham: Victory relieves some pressure on boss Ange Postecoglou

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on DJ & producer Sherelle with his predictions for this weekend's Premier League fixtures.
articles.title: Premier League predictions: Chris Sutton v DJ & producer Sherelle

articles.description: After their sensational Europa League comeback win over Lyon, Manchester United are just three games from a trophy in a comical season that could end in glory or embarrassment, writes Simon Stone.
articles.title: Manchester United 5-4 Lyon: Ruben Amorim's side 'begin to show never-say-die DNA'

articles.description: Justin Thomas equals the course record to take a three-shot lead in the opening round at the RBC Heritage.
articles.title: Justin Thomas equals course record to take three-shot lead at RBC Heritage

articles.description: Chelsea may be through to the semi-finals of the Europa Conference League, but the boos that followed their surprise defeat by Legia Warsaw summed up the current mood of dissent at Stamford Bridge.
articles.title: Chelsea: 'If you don't prepare right, you will pay' - Blues concerns increase after loss
